name: The No Trust Islands
description:
- - - WASD to move, Left Click to shoot, TAB to change weapon, SPACE to dash - - -

 - - -Start with a random weapon!  Can you escape these cursed islands? - - -

Theme: Trust No One

  • I used this theme by having everyone on the islands tell a lie.  Therefore trust no one!
  • Game engine: Unity 2D.
  • Sprites made in Photoshop CC.
  • Sound made by sfxr.
  • Music made in ecrett music.

I’m really happy with how the game came out in just 2 days~!  I have to sleep now... so no GIFs for voting start day XD

  • My learning goals for this game were: Trying to do island tilemaps and an audio manager.  Also, frame by frame animation. (I usually do Blackthornprod style)
  • Biggest struggle:  UI... Easy fix I just couldn't see haha
  • KNOWN BUGS
    • Very low chance but sometimes walls don't despawn, so just pause and go to main menu to try again. (not sure why yet)
      • Sometimes if you wait 10 to 30 seconds they despawn lol ...T . T

I look forward to playing other’s games and leaving feedback, I hope I get some awesome constructive criticisms as well!
